title: I have literally hundreds of emails, the majority of which are from advertisements. How can I delete them while they're in the Inbox, rather than having to place each one in a folder and then deleting them?

title: New mails are taking 6 seconds to open and preview
content:
Dear Support Team, I am using Thunder bird nebula 128.4 3esr (64bit) From last two days I am facing an issue opening new mails and running filters. New mails are taking around 6 secs to get open or preview the content. The application freezes till the process is complete.

I tried Inbox Repair, Thunderbird /safe and disable add-on options. But issue remained the same in all the scenario.

Please let me know, what could be done to fix the issue.
creator: cmohan246

title: I would like to know how to stop the ads coming into my email. There will be 4, 5,6 in a sequence sent and this is on a constant basis. I would like to know how to stop thse. I was marking them "as junk" but that is not helping
content: It is the vast input of ads being posted onto my email account. It is not just one - the same ads repeats itself 4, 5 or more times. I do not see any where to block them or how to keep thisd from happening on a daily basis. It is really picking up momentum. It is too much and I need your help. Thank you Jean Williams

title: Formato preferito visualizzazione indirizzi
content: Se modifico l'impostazione da quella predefinita "Nome completo e indirizzo e-mail" a "Solo nome", nella colonna Mittente compare solo il nome. Senonché, se chiudo Thinderbird, alla successivo riapertura, torna l'impostazione iniziale con nome completo e indirizzo e-mail. Come si fa a salvare l'impostazione desiderata? Grazie.
